title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-4.1 - Permission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-4.1 - Permission

State Regulations

Any boiler that was operated in New York State prior to

January 1, 1918, or any boiler changing location within the State may be
reinstalled provided an "Application for Permission to Install a Second-Hand

Boiler" is filed with the commissioner and permission is granted for
reinstallation of same. Exception: Horizontal-return tubular boilers having a continuous
longitudinal lap seam of more than 12 feet in length, shall not be
reinstalled. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-4.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
